---------------------------

Rounding mode: Round to nearest (imm=0)

Input:  : 0.000000 -0.000000 1.000000 -1.000000 
Output: : 0000 8000 3c00 bc00

Output: : 57b7 d7b7 7c00 fc00

Output: : 7e00 fe00 0000 8000
